automation_task: Open {site_url}. If not logged in, reply LOGIN_REQUIRED. Click the + button next to the prompt box, choose 'Deep research'. If a tooltip shows remaining uses, proceed. Enter this query exactly, appending: 'Include sources and list all source URLs at the end under a heading URLS: one URL per line.': {prompt}. Submit. Wait until the answer finishes streaming. Then open the Sources / Citations panel if available and collect every visible source URL. If none are visible, scroll the response and extract any URLs shown in the text. If still none, ask a follow-up: 'List all source URLs only.' Wait for the reply. Finally output 'URLS:' on its own line and list one URL per line (no other text).

Open {site_url}. If not logged in, reply LOGIN_REQUIRED. Start a new chat. Switch to Expert mode (or 'Expert' model) if available in the UI. Enter this query exactly: {prompt}. Submit and wait for completion. Then output 'URLS:' on its own line and list every source URL mentioned in the response, one per line.
